descriptionSet.description: A sample calender page shows a map of India, Bangladesh and Sri Lanka including small images of major attractive sites of religious and/or historical importance, including the Taj Mahal, different god , etc. The image is surrounded by several customizable areas for product advertisements. On the bottom, there is an overview calendar of march 1954.

inscription.text: ORIENTAL CALENDAR Mfg. Co. Manufacturers Of Novelty Calendars Post Box No. 11212 Calcutta-14.
Medium Grade Calendars in 10" x 15" Size.
This is a Sample of our complete Calendar in 10" x 15" size with tin mounting on top & bottom, datepads No. 4 & with customer's advt. For Prices See clause No. 11. of our pricelist.
All the Designs from No. 601 to 708 shown in this album are available in all the 3 sizes and Grades (Special, High & Medium)
Book Your Orders as early as possible in advance. Delay sometimes causes Disappointment and inconvenience.

location.name: Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art
Delhi / The Priya Paul Collection of Popular Art
